content: After we have been harmed and our will to defend ourselves attacked by aggressive forces such as Red, Yellow or Purple - through covert means, we may have no other option but to resort to this more overt strategy. Despite this setback in diplomacy we will continue seeking cooperation in order  ensure regional stability while at the same time bolstering our military readiness towards an increasing  strategic threat.
